评论详情: I got this for the Christmas season. As such I wore it during some cold nights, it was almost as warm as a coat. I also got a lot of comments on how pretty it was
True to size! Completely loved it! It complements by dress perfectly
Absolutely gorgeous wrap, nothing more to say!!
I loved the looks and everything but it was a Yellowish Ivory. I was disappointed bc I really liked everything else about it.

I ordered this shawl for my outdoor January 1 wedding.  When it first arrived it was smooshed and wrinkled and I didn't know if I would like it.  I hung it up over a drying rack for a few days and let it "air out"  (no- it didn't smell).  I was hoping the wrinkles would come out - and it worked!  I wore it on my wedding day and it was perfect for a chilly outdoor wedding.  It also photographed beautifully.
